ingredients: 6 large eggs, beaten, 3   +   1/2 cups white sugar, 10  fresh peaches, pitted and chopped, 4 cups heavy cream, 2 cups half-and-half cream, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract,   +   3/4 teaspoon salt
nutrition: Total Fat 14g 18%, Saturated Fat 8g 41%, Cholesterol 81mg 27%, Sodium 86mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 25g 9%, Total Sugars 24g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 13mg 67%, Calcium 44mg 3%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 66mg 1%
